title: Step 14

challengeFiles.name: index
styles

tests.text: You should create a new variable named --building-color1.

description: Now you have something that is resembling a building. You are ready to create your first variable. Variable declarations begin with two dashes (-) and are given a name and a value like this: --variable-name: value;. In the rule for the bb1 class, create a variable named --building-color1 and give it a value of #999.
